remarks: A continuous function on complex numbers restricted to a subset. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)
statement:
cncfres.1 $e |- A C_ CC $.
cncfres.2 $e |- B C_ CC $.
cncfres.3 $e |- F = ( x e. CC |-> C ) $.
cncfres.4 $e |- G = ( x e. A |-> C ) $.
cncfres.5 $e |- ( x e. A -> C e. B ) $.
cncfres.6 $e |- F e. ( CC -cn-> CC ) $.
cncfres.7 $e |- J = ( MetOpen ` ( ( abs o. - ) |` ( A X. A ) ) ) $.
cncfres.8 $e |- K = ( MetOpen ` ( ( abs o. - ) |` ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
cncfres $p |- G e. ( J Cn K ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d J x $.
$d K x $.
